A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What movie did all these negative reviewers watch? This film took so many bold chances and I loved it. The Finn/Rose story arc was the weakest but overall Rion Johnson took risks and didn't rely on doing what we've already seen. Poe's arc was very impactful. Kylo delivered bettee than anticipated. The conflict Luke has with himself adds new elements to his character. The cinematography for the battle scenes was masterful and provided viewpoint unseen in any other SW film. I'm a bigger Star Wars fan today than before I saw this. Empire still ranks #1 but this could sneak into my top 3 Star Wars films. Wish Rion Johnson would come back for Episode IX but I'm looking forward to his next chapter with the franchise.
